description: Versioned transform definitions for all 13 WasteDB parameters. Each transform converts raw extracted values to normalized ratios (0-1 scale).

transforms.name: Yield
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is extraction yield as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Degradability
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is degradation rate as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Contamination
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is contamination tolerance as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Maturity
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is market maturity as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Energy
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is energy efficiency as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Biodegradation
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is biodegradation rate as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Nutrient Balance
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is nutrient balance score as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Toxicity
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is toxicity safety score as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Habitat Adaptability
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is habitat adaptability score as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Lifetime
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is expected lifetime score as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Repairability
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is repairability score as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Upgradability
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is upgradability score as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

transforms.name: Contamination (Reusability)
transforms.description: Convert percentage to ratio. Raw value is contamination tolerance for reuse as percentage (0-100%), transformed to ratio (0-1).
transforms.changelog: Initial version - direct percentage to ratio conversion

usage_notes: All transforms currently use simple percentage-to-ratio conversion (divide by 100)
Future versions may implement non-linear transforms based on research findings
When updating a transform, increment version number and update effective_date
Old transform versions should be preserved in changelog for audit trail
Recompute jobs should be triggered whenever transform formulas change
